channel.title: Did rep acually help this community?
channel.description:
Some ups and downs of this thing called "rep"
The ups.
1. Have you guys noticed that most of the people that came here for rep, acually learned something.
2. Some people that came here for rep acually weren't lazy and made their servers by themselves.
The downs.
1. People only came for rep and spammed the forums.
2. People only came for rep just to get respect.
Please post your opinions.
Do not say that this is the wrong section because I know it is. Do not flame.
Thanks

item.title: Did rep acually help this community?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:

Evan`:

Saying rep helps the community is like saying[b] moparscapers are helping private servers develop.

lol’d

Read full topic

I registered an account named ‘fire_’, they never sent me an e-mail
I waited 4 days, nothing.
I clicked ‘re-send my email registration’, nothing sent.
So I asked one of my admins if he has an un-used mopar account, check the date of this acc[/quote]

BTW XX_qwertyuiop_XX i banned myself from the IRC on purpose.

item.title: Did rep acually help this community?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“Evan`, post:23, topic:189583”][quote author=Lusfr link=topic=252497.msg2111406#msg2111406 date=1205627591]
give mod, gmod, admin, vet’s (NOT CMS) ability to rep –
[/quote]Cm’s are better then the vets.[/quote]

CMS are ASSHOLES from MITB and that’s why there are no new vets because they all vote no when a new poll goes up and they have more then current vets so they fuck us over. Join the #mopar irc once and you’ll see howm uch they hate us

[quote=“bcdutton, post:1, topic:189594”]I wasn’t going to get unbanned anyways.

I appreciate your help for trying to get me unbanned lusfr[/quote]

MITB said it was a little harsh and was asking for help on deciding to unban you. I know you would have been unbanned if you waited

item.title: Did rep acually help this community?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“bcdutton, post:1, topic:189588”]Reputation just makes everything worse

I remember when I was a beginner to Mopar, playing old school Varrock servers.

I would be happy getting rep because it made me feel good

A year later rep doesn’t mean anything anymore, so I wanted a rep reset

But instead they ip me instead

A waste of total time logged in: 41 days

yes i am delta…[/quote]

no i bet you deff don’t get unbanned

item.title: Did rep acually help this community?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

bhpkyeah:

i could give a shit about rep, or anything with rank, i enjoy learning new things, and its fun creating something that you made and it works… all that rep shit is just politics in a gamer kind of way

same
its fun makeing your own skill from scratch never know how its going to turn out
and when you do get it to work your excited
but you can also go to others for help
then after awhile of learning basic java from p servers you can go do bigger things

Read full topic

item.title: Did rep acually help this community?
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“openice123, post:12, topic:189583”]lots went to runa server because no one flames there alot (some do)
theres copy and paste tutorials there so beginers can learn where to put the basic stuff there
you can have avatars which is just plain awesome
and i think its nicer there - my opinion

but for the last 2 days its been down for me im probably banned but idk why
anyways[/quote]
God of Ikiliki said everyone that came from there are flamers and leechers :l…He pmed me that anyways when I said my opinion about the site. People who try to leech off that site usually get caught the second they do it. I do like the tuts, it helped me learn alot more than I did when I first started o.O.

Some new players from that site usually go here and leech what was on it to get rep.

Read full topic

item.title: Did rep acually help this community?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

lots went to runa server because no one flames there alot (some do)
theres copy and paste tutorials there so beginers can learn where to put the basic stuff there
you can have avatars which is just plain awesome
and i think its nicer there - my opinion

but for the last 2 days its been down for me im probably banned but idk why
anyways

i say yes/no on this
rep is a way to see how good you are doing (by reading the comments)
but…if you just read the replys and remember them i guess that works to
so idc

people do come here just to get rep and show off
but some others dont

Read full topic

item.title: Did rep acually help this community?
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

Rep = Good for some people, Bad for noobs in the community. I’ve seen about every thread on the tutorial section about 3 times and everyone leechs. I’ve even see a 135 repped user leech delta’s npc dialogues tut for rep.

I’ve been around since I don’t know, May of last year and I always liked to play and not learn. Now I’ve started helping and I think rep makes me want to stay here and help.

Only thing I do hate, is SOME of the people that asked for rep on purpose act like they’re all that, but I doubt they received all their rep fair. I do think that at least half of the community is here for rep and only rep, I know where they are all at too.

Read full topic
item.source: Did rep acually help this community?
